verbose_text: Indeed, although the general pattern of H 2 O 2 -induced expression of Pap1 dependent genes was similar in wild-type and Deltatxl1 cells (XREF_FIG), quantitative analysis indicated that basal levels of mRNA for three Pap1 dependent genes, gst2 +, srx1 +, and obr1 +, were all significantly increased.
